mapper.select: select vsa.recruit_no, vsa.member_no, vsa.motivate, m.id, m.name, m.mail_address from voluntary_service_applicate vsa, member m where vsa.member_no=m.member_no and recruit_no=#{value}
select vao.recruit_no, m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.mail_address from voluntary_applicant_ok vao, member m where vao.member_no=m.member_no and recruit_no=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from voluntary_service_applicate where recruit_no=#{recruitNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
